title: Topic 001 Question 201
body: A company is storing data that will not be frequently accessed in the AWS Cloud. If the company needs to access the data, the data needs to be retrieved within 12 hours. The company wants a solution that is cost-effective for storage costs for each gigabyte.
Which Amazon S3 storage class will meet these requirements?
options: S3 One Zone-Infrequent Access (S3 One Zone-IA)
